thread.title: Steve Kerr ejected after epic tirade
thread.title_full: Steve Kerr ejected after epic tirade

author: USA TODAY Sports
title: Steve Kerr ejected after epic tirade
text:
Steve Kerr ejected after epic tirade The Warriors lost, 109-106. Post to Facebook Steve Kerr ejected after epic tirade The Warriors lost, 109-106.  //ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/steve-kerr-thrown-out-warriors-kings/   Steve Kerr ejected after epic tirade Nina Mandell , USA TODAY Sports 8:07 a.m. ET Feb. 5, 2017 
Golden State Warriors assistant coach Mike Brown, right, restrains Warriors head coach Steve Kerr, left, as he yells at official Bill Spooner who had ejected Kerr during the second half of an NBA basketball game against the Sacramento Kings. (Photo: AP) 
Steve Kerr unleashed a tirade of expletives on officials during the third quarter of the Warriors-Kings game on Saturday night after Draymond Green received a technical for arguing a call.
